title: Data management (SuperSet)
body:
MongoDB is not supported by Apache SuperSet. Relational DB like PostgreSQL is.

Would Pongo help in fixing this issue ?
author: clement-igonet

comments.body:
I'm not an expert with Apache SuperSet, but based on my research, it supports PostgreSQL JSONB queries, so it should work well as Pongo is _just_ a wrapper on top of regular PostgreSQL.

Could you tell me more about your use case? ðŸ™‚
@clement-igonet, I'm closing it for now, feel free to ask follow up questions if you have more :slightly_smiling_face:

title: FIX: typo in variable name in README
body: Tiny fix in the example: `alice` variable was used instead of the (supposedly correct) `anita`.
author: Corwinpro
